summary: Simple add in skyrim two khajiit followers.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod add two followers in the game. Female and male Khajiit and they are both marryable. They can be found just out side Riverwood heading in Whiterun. They both level with you up to 55 and are essentials. They also visit in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn time to time. Also tested with Dawnguard and works fine.

They also use Flames as magic and combat style is combatscout. Voice type is youngeagar.

If you prefer to download it from STEAM, here\'s the link:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=88969070
author: Jermu73
